ti:edition.ti:label: De Virtutibus
ti:edition.ti:description: Philo Judaeus. Opera quae supersunt, Volume 5. Cohn, Leonard, editor. Berlin: Reimer, 1906.

ti:translation.ti:label: On Three Virtues, that is to say, on Courage, Humanity, and Repentance
ti:translation.ti:description: The works of Philo Judaeus, the contemporary of Josephus, volume 3. Yonge, C. D., translator. London: Henry G. Bohn, 1855.
